snippet: The actor jumps from Scribner in a coup for Amazon Publishing, which will publish "Actors Anonymous" in 2013.
abstract: The actor jumps from Scribner in a coup for Amazon Publishing, which will publish "Actors Anonymous" in 2013.
lead_paragraph: James Franco, the laconic actor who collects M.F.A.'s when he isn't starring in movies or hosting the Oscars, will publish his first novel in 2013. "Actors Anonymous," a follow-up to "Palo Alto," a book of short stories that was released in 2010, was acquired by Amazon Publishing New York, the company said on Wednesday. Ed Park, the senior editor who acquired the book, called it "a hugely ambitious and wild ride."

headline.main: Amazon to Publish Novel by James Franco
